name: Vasoon Animation
tag_list: animation, chinese, china, studio, production, 2d, 3d, television, film, beijing
overview:
Vasoon Animation is a Chinese animation studio that produces television shows and films.

Founded in 1992, Vasoon Animation is China’s leading and oldest private animation studio. Our 180 + animation professionals are involved with all aspects of animation, including publishing, new media, editing, planning, design, production and direction. The talented animators of Vasoon utilize a full spectrum of animation styles, include 2D, 3D, modern realism, chinese modern painting style, and comic realism. Vasoon Animation internationally produces and distributes a complete range of entertainment products, including animated feature films, animated TV series, artistic animated short films, novels, comic books and animated interactive applications. Vasoon Animation has released international award winning titles, such as Kuiba 2, Kuiba, Bird, Spring Mood and Scholar Cat. Our core belief is 一起创造世界 (Together, we create the world).
